title: Implement Secure Login
description: As a customer, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: The login system must support multi-factor authentication, adhere to password policies, manage user sessions, and include secure logout mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can log in using MFA. 2. Password policies are enforced. 3. Session management policies are applied. 4. Users can securely log out.
test_cases: Given a customer with valid credentials, when they attempt to log in, then they are prompted for MFA. Given a customer logged in, when their session times out, then they are securely logged out.

epic_title: Core Portal Setup and Responsive UI Framework
title: Develop Responsive Portal UI
description: As a customer, I want a responsive self-service portal, so that I can access it easily from any device.
attributes_and_rules: The portal must be responsive, accessible, and provide a consistent theme and navigation across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal is accessible on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. 2. UI elements adapt to different screen sizes. 3. Consistent theme and user experience across devices.
test_cases: Given a customer on a mobile device, when they access the portal, then the content is properly displayed and accessible. Given a customer on a desktop, when they use the portal, then the navigation and theme are consistent.

epic_title: Integration Layer with Core Banking System
title: Establish API Integration with Core Banking
description: As a developer, I want to integrate the portal with core banking systems, so that real-time data retrieval and submission are possible.
attributes_and_rules: The integration must use robust APIs and services to ensure high reliability and performance, and it must include error handling, logging, and monitoring mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time data retrieval and submission are enabled. 2. Reliable performance with robust error handling. 3. Error logs and monitoring mechanisms are in place.
test_cases: Given a customer request for account data, when the system processes the request, then real-time data is retrieved successfully. Given an error during data submission, when the system logs the error, then the error is captured and logged correctly.

title: Create Dynamic and Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard displaying my banking products, so that I can easily access relevant information.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must display personalized information based on customer attributes and behavior analytics, support dynamic content delivery, quick navigation, and user-friendly data visualization.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Personalized information is displayed. 2. Dynamic content delivery. 3. Quick navigation to services.
test_cases: Given a customer logged in, when they view the dashboard, then personalized account information is displayed. Given an update in customer data, when the system processes the update, then the dashboard is dynamically adjusted.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Interactive Account Opening Workflow
description: As a customer, I want an interactive workflow to open a new account, so that I can complete the process quickly and easily online.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must include guided steps, data collection forms, document upload, eligibility checks, and digital signatures.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Guided steps and data collection forms are provided. 2. Document upload and eligibility checks are included. 3. Digital signature support.
test_cases: Given a customer starting a new account application, when they proceed through the workflow, then guided instructions and necessary forms are provided. Given a customer uploading required documents, when the documents are submitted, then the system verifies and accepts them.

title: Enable Real-Time Status Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates on my requests, so that I am informed of the status promptly.
attributes_and_rules: The system must provide real-time request status tracking and automated email notifications with event-based triggers.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time status updates are provided. 2. Automated email notifications are sent based on events.
test_cases: Given a customer with an ongoing request, when there is a status change, then the customer receives a real-time update. Given an approval email trigger event, when the event occurs, then an email notification is sent to the customer.

epic_title: User Activity History and Data Management
title: Implement User Activity Tracking System
description: As a customer, I want a historical view of all my interactions, so that I can audit my activities on the portal.
attributes_and_rules: The system must record all interactions, maintain secure storage, and provide efficient retrieval through indexing and search capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All interactions are recorded and securely stored. 2. Indexed and searchable historical data. 3. Retrieval of interaction history.
test_cases: Given a customer performing actions on the portal, when the actions are completed, then they are recorded in the activity log. Given a customer searching for historical data, when they use the search feature, then the relevant records are retrieved quickly.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Management
title: Develop RBAC System for User Permissions
description: As an administrator, I want to manage user permissions based on roles, so that access to features is secure and appropriate.
attributes_and_rules: The system must enforce role-based access control and integrate with identity management to ensure consistent security policy enforcement.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users have access based on their role. 2. Integration with identity management. 3. Consistent policy enforcement.
test_cases: Given an admin assigning roles, when they set permissions, then users have access according to their roles. Given a user accessing the portal, when their role changes, then access permissions are updated accordingly.

title: Set Up Optimized Local Data Store
description: As a developer, I want a fast and reliable local database, so that portal performance is enhanced independently of the core banking system.
attributes_and_rules: The local database must support fast read/write operations, caching, synchronization mechanisms, and maintain high availability and fault tolerance.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Fast read/write operations. 2. Effective caching and data synchronization. 3. High availability and fault tolerance.
test_cases: Given frequent data access, when the operations are performed, then they are executed quickly. Given a change in core data, when synchronization triggers, then the local database is updated in near real-time.
